StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAMigrateZips]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
declare @org_id int, @mcc varchar(5), @zip varchar(9), @user varchar(15), @update_date date.me, @deleted char(1)
declare zipcode cursor for
select mcc_code, zip_code from arms..zipcode_migrate
open zipcode
fetch zipcode into @mcc, @zip
set @user='migra.on' set @update_date=getdate() set @deleted='N'
while (@@fetch_status = 0) begin
set @org_id = (select organiza.on_id from recrui.ng_organiza.on where MCC_CODE = @mcc)
if @org_id is not null begin if not exists (select 1 from zip_code_assignment where zip_code = @zip) begin insert into zip_code_assignment (organiza.on_id, zip_code, deleted, user_login, update_date) values (@org_id, @zip, @deleted, @user, @update_date)
print 'ZIP CODE INSERTED'
end
else begin update zip_code_assignment set organiza.on_id = @org_id, zip_code = @zip, deleted = @deleted, user_login = @user, update_date = @update_date where zip_code = @zip
print 'ZIP CODE UPDATED'
end
end else print @mcc +' '+ 'IS NOT A VALID MCC_CODE'
fetch zipcode into @mcc, @zip
end
close zipcode deallocate zipcode
